timeline.bodyText:
could maybe do
healthCheckDeactivated = healthCheckDeactivated || Duration.between(...).compareTo(...) < 0;
timeline.author: Jolyon-S
Jolyon-S

timeline.bodyText: Probably worth a comment explaining why this is a thing.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: Are we guaranteed that the health check executes from the same thread every time? Even if this is the case, it feels like it would make sense to be defensive against this as this isn't a hot path
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: This test makes sense for now. The aggregation and/or threshold probably needs revisiting if timelock partitioning is introduced.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
